AppSyncApiId.Description: The id of the AppSync API associated with this project.

AppSyncApiName.Description: The name of the AppSync API

AuthCognitoUserPoolId.Description: The id of an existing User Pool to connect. If this is changed, a user pool will not be created for you.

env.Description: The environment name. e.g. Dev, Test, or Production

rdsClusterIdentifier.Description: The ARN identifier denoting the RDS cluster.

rdsSecretStoreArn.Description: The ARN for the Secret containing the access for the RDS cluster.

rdsDatabaseName.Description: The name of the database within the RDS cluster to use.

S3DeploymentBucket.Description: The S3 bucket containing all deployment assets for the project.

S3DeploymentRootKey.Description:
An S3 key relative to the S3DeploymentBucket that points to the root
of the deployment directory.

rdsDatabaseName.Description: Table name for the RDS table

EmptyOutput.Description: An empty output. You may delete this if you have at least one resource above.
